scenario_text.value: There! I’m picking up a strange noise!

So now we just need to look around there? No
problem!

Everyone start searching. Takuma, you give us
directions!
I found it! There’s a weak spot in the floor!

Why not see for yourself? Here, let’s tear up
the floor.

It’s so old and rotten it should be easy.
Here goes nothing.

(A deep, dark hole lined with stones is now
open before us, leading down out of sight.)
What is this? Some sort of well?
